QuestData.Title: Nethermine Flayer Hide
QuestData.Description: A skinner, eh? Well you'll find plenty to skin here! You gotta search for flayers around crystal formations. Take 'em down and take their hides. Sometimes they'll have a hide worth keepin'. Bring those to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Taskmaster Varkule Dragonbreath at Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to bring him 35 Nethermine Flayer Hides.
QuestData.CompletionText: We use the flayer hides for armor lining and structural tarps.
QuestData.RewardText: You're done for today, kid. Come back tomorrow if you're still alive.
